title: In vitro encapsulation and expansion of T and CAR-T cells using 3D synthetic thermo-responsive matrices
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13734-13747
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01968G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Gaby D. Lizana-Vasquez, Janet Mendez-Vega, Dan Cappabianca, Krishanu Saha, Madeline Torres-Lugo
This work employed a biocompatible and synthetic-based thermo-responsive material with tailored mechanical properties as a potential macro-scale scaffold to support ex vivo T and CAR-T cell encapsulation and culture.
